text: Ara tara nijedera kache jnana asara pare'o bicchinna haye yeta na yadi-na nijedera madhye irsa-bidbesa thakata. Ara yadi tomara prabhura kacha theke ekati nirdharita kala paryanta ekati bani itipurbe dharya haye na thakata tahale niscaya'i tadera madhye hestanesta haye yeta. Ara tamdera pare yara dharmagrantha uttaradhikara karechila tara to eti sanbandhe bibhrantikara sandehe rayeche.
